# iosxr_lpts_punt_police (Data Source)

This data source can read the LPTS Punt Police configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_lpts_punt_police" "example" {
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `bcast_rate` (Number) Rate in PPS
- `domains` (Attributes List) LPTS Domain (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--domains))
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `interfaces` (Attributes List) Per interface level policer configuration (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--interfaces))
- `mcast_rate` (Number) Rate in PPS
- `protocol_arp_rate` (Number) Rate in PPS
- `protocol_cdp_rate` (Number) Rate in PPS
- `protocol_ipv6_nd_proxy_rate` (Number) Rate in PPS
- `protocol_lacp_rate` (Number) Rate in PPS
- `protocol_lldp_rate` (Number) Rate in PPS
- `protocol_ssfp_rate` (Number) Rate in PPS

<a id="nestedatt--domains"></a>
### Nested Schema for `domains`

Read-Only:

- `bcast_rate` (Number) Rate in PPS
- `domain_name` (String) LPTS Domain
- `mcast_rate` (Number) Rate in PPS
- `protocol_arp_rate` (Number) Rate in PPS
- `protocol_cdp_rate` (Number) Rate in PPS
- `protocol_ipv6_nd_proxy_rate` (Number) Rate in PPS
- `protocol_lacp_rate` (Number) Rate in PPS
- `protocol_lldp_rate` (Number) Rate in PPS
- `protocol_ssfp_rate` (Number) Rate in PPS


<a id="nestedatt--interfaces"></a>
### Nested Schema for `interfaces`

Read-Only:

- `bcast_disabled` (Boolean) disable punt policer
- `bcast_rate` (Number) Rate in PPS
- `interface_name` (String) Per interface level policer configuration
- `mcast_disabled` (Boolean) disable punt policer
- `mcast_rate` (Number) Rate in PPS
